locations.title: Pit Stop Travel Plaza
locations.content: Pit Stop Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The bathroom was clean and fully provisioned, the #2 shower was as well. The only downside to the shower was that it was one of those fiberglass economy stalls with the built in seat and the showerhead was one of those water-mizer massage ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ staff, good selection of food. Have to try the Russian restaurant across the street. It is AMAZING. Both lots have enough room for at least 7 semis to park at so, drivers, roll in and have a nice hot meal and a place to rest and shower.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Again, the lady working there was awesome! I think she said her name was Josie. Anyway, I went to the shower and I was very disappointed. I know it‚Äôs a truck stop and all but for $17 I expect it to be clean. It definitely needs some work. ‚Ä¶

All of this dirt came from the sink countertop. There were dried up dirt stains all over the counter as if it wasn‚Äôt touched all day. We deserve better for a paid shower. This place is already making me sick.

Nasty showers we walked into last night I don‚Äôt know rather it was dog hair or what but it was all over the towel and shower like it wasn‚Äôt even cleaned after the last person. Never stopping here again!
Good service for oil change and lube, clean shower and restroom.  Good service at the restaurant and a quiet place to stay.  Good spot for a reset of your hours.
Shower was hot, low pressure and the floors and toilet were dirty unswept
It was great as always and just can't believe so many parking places.and my shower was great
Shower not bad at all clean nit,the restaurant was clean ,food good
Was not able to use a shower

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean, hot, spacious showers. (Even the fan in shower 14, not a spec of dust!)  Friendly faces. There was actual milk and creamer! The washing machine? clean!  The type of establishment that restores your faith in humanity. üòÅ ‚Ä¶
Was so impressed with the nice, clean and hot showers.  Water pressure was perfect from the shower head.  Good job on how well kept this place was.

It's a truck stop for quick purchases of food, gas, a quick shower, laundry, and a Dennys Restaurant which was a skillet breakfast my husband and I had.  Our waitress was very good and quick with our order of some delicious coffee.

Best shower I've had in 3 months including home shower, felt like a scalding hot pressure washer. Very clean bathrooms. You normal flying j store. Plenty or room for parking and maneuvers. Dennys was on point waitress was sweet.

‚Ä¶ as car parking. Exiting the diesel pumps can be a little tricky when busy because of limited room. Good people who work there. Great coffee, hot food to go or restaurant if you want to sit and eat. Have never had a long wait for a shower.
Very nice clean comfortable place to catch up on rest, fill your belly and shower. Great place for sprinter parking.

‚Ä¶ this one has a Denny's which was really good, and also has Dunkin express for breakfast. Of course they've got their pizza and other fresh foods as well. Shower was hot and clean, bathrooms were clean as well. Decent place to take a break.
Best shower pressure, and plenty of hot water.  Parking lot in great shape, and easy to get around.  Was going to eat at Denny's, but a 40 minute wait for food.
Very nice view. Took a 34 hour here. Did my Landry took a shower and relaxed. My stay would have been better if they would fix the WiFI. Please fix the WiFi.
The 2 stars are because of the coffee that's it. The lot is huge but riddled with huge pot holes. There's a smell. Like old mold just not clean. I didn't eat or shower here. The staff was friendly

showerReviews.reviewText: I stop here all the time. They have courteous staff, nice shower facilities, and parking that's easily accessible. 4 stars, not 5 because the fuel prices are a bit high and the men's restroom could use some work. But overall I like it here
Free parking, have shower, laundry

80 gallons of fuel and no points or shower on my rewards card. It happens about half the time I use Pilot /Flying J. That‚Äôs why I only use them when I absolutely have to. No wonder they‚Äôre losing so much business to Loves. I have never once ‚Ä¶

I recently stopped at the Pilot Travel Center around 9 AM, expecting to grab a quick shower before getting back on the road. With barely any trucks in the parking lot, I figured it would be fast. Instead, I ended up waiting **1 hour and 25 ‚Ä¶

8 quests ahed , at shower, after one hour 12. I quess they are to lazy to clean the showers . Place was not buzzy .  People are complaining for the long waiting times.  So, thanks but no thanks. I decide to refuel at nearby TA, you no need ‚Ä¶
the shower doesn't work. repairs are underway

‚Ä¶ mornings in a row.  They are very lax about cleaning the showers , even though they were slow I had to wait 20 minutes for someone to do a half-hearted cleaning, the next two times I gave up and left. They also have employees who ‚Ä¶

Worst experience EVER at this pilot. Me and my boyfriend went in to take a shower late night around 11:45pm and all 5 showers were available but haven't been cleaned.  Well we waited about 20 mins or so and i happened to go to the back to ‚Ä¶

Kudos to the shower staff. We are truckers and clean showers mean a lot to us and this Pilot at the time we were there had extremely clean showers. We were there two nights and showered both nights and both times the showers were very clean ‚Ä¶

Very busy. Small. Appears to be a fave with tourists, so there can be lines at peak times. Five showers. Closed the Ladies' room for cleaning and took 2 showers out of rotation at 7 pm. Got a shower about 10 pm. Two washers/dryers in the ‚Ä¶

They don't tell you that you have to log in first to collect points towards your showers. So after swiping my card for hundreds in fuel, I come to get my first shower and get told I need to activate the card online before getting any credit ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I went to take a shower, and when I got in, the sink was completely covered in someone else's feces, and the sink was covered in hair. So I went looking for whoever cleaned it to tell them they hadn't, but I couldn't find them. I thought it ‚Ä¶

I went to take a shower and was standing right by the door in shower 5 shaving ü™í then I heard someone opening the door without knocking I came out to ask him is there a problem he said no n I asked why did you try opening my door without ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ very careful when reaching for paper towels cause there are big spiders as well, you might become Spiderman. Dirty and old. Also restrooms have no ac and showers also no ac, so either cold shower or sweat while showering.  Small parking lot ‚Ä¶

Pretty decent. I did take a shower while I was there and three out of the four towel hooks were missing. The place where you put your shampoo will not hold a full size bottle of shampoo. If you take anything else in the shower with you, ‚Ä¶
for a shower that is ready. in a moment just do your job. no one is forcing you to do it. if you are fed up just quit work.

‚Ä¶ by a truck stop bathroom - it was cleaner than my home bathroom that is professionally cleaned once a week. The shower was the same. After seven days traveling across the country with my husband from CA to PA, and the fact of how rural ‚Ä¶

There's something seriously wrong if someone can open the door when you're in the shower. If it was the person who cleans the showers, they need to knock first! ...which they didn't even do when I was in the shower. ‚Ä¶

I found fecal (poop) streaks going across a wash cloth in the shower room. That means they don‚Äôt wash the towels very well because they‚Äôre in a hurry. I feel bad for all my fellow truckers who had to use towels washed in the same batch as ‚Ä¶
Shower emty but they not clean long time wait 50 minutes people free

Truck drivers, let this be your last choice to stop for anything. Fuel, food, shower etc. An average Love's at best. Usually not too clean. Very spacious parking but good luck finding one if you get there after 3 pm. Fuel islands are almost ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Always good for a place to park, a shower, some food and drinks and just about anything you could want even slot machines and other forms of video gambling.
They got it all even a shower!!!! Love dis place

got fuel for $480.00 and try to get shower me and my wife and they told me we can not take shower in the same shower room we need to use separate rooms and one shower room is clean and the other one needs to be clean in next 1 hour ...(at ‚Ä¶

The hallway back to the bathroom/ shower area smells absolutely awful. It's constantly like this too! Almost the smell of sewer or something.
Please do something about this, it's almost causing me to stop coming here.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ older than 2 years should be removed. This place has a new management feel. BIG parking log (free) and potholes are no more. bathroom and shower look recently renovated and are clean.( It's up to all the users to help keep it that way) ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have definitely given this truck stop a 0. Pumps are out. Only 2 showers plus, there‚Äôs a sign saying if you stay in the shower for more than 30 minutes, you‚Äôll be charged 20$. Washroom is filthy. Staff is lazy. Potholes in the parking. I‚Äôll ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ me sick the next day, small restroom, you cannot accommodate a lot of driver a day(150 parking for trailer) 3 shower room you cannot lock when you are cleaning yourself.  Rude employees, I can make a 200 pages book with what's wrong here
Only 3 showers,  cannot lock your shower door. Sink was clogged up. Shower took 7 min to get hot water. Only 1 ply toilet paper. ‚Ä¶

The store is a dump. Light in the shower didn't work, didn't have a water tight cover and was about to fall down. Also the water was Luke warm. I sent pics to pilot and they wrote back saying it wasn't a company store so there was nothing ‚Ä¶
It's a TA now. It is open. Was able to get a shower but they don't pride in keeping them clean. Small building but they are offering a food selection or there's a little diner across the street

This place does not even deserve 1 star. I parked for my 34 here and went to take a shower and when I say they do not clean the showers at all I mean not at all. Now I know the little that pilots do far as wipe a shower down with a towel ‚Ä¶

Parking lot is huge. Pot holes everywhere.  Tried to go for a shower at 4 am, was told no showers until 5 cause they had nobody to clean them. Bathrooms were disgusting. Some local POS driving around parking lot blaring horn all throughout ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ gas station that the country has!!!! disgusting toilets. the lady who attends here is a complete lazy .. do not offer shower only because they do not want!!!!.. this place is the worst they should close it or change the administration ... ‚Ä¶
Shower was good size but had no hot water
